original_title: Orgia ou O Homem Que Deu Cria
overview: A countryman kills his father and heads for the big city. On his way, he meets the most bizarre and allegorical types: a robber, a drag queen who thinks he's Carmen Miranda, a black king, a fallen black angel, a priest, two whores, a pregnant cowboy, among others.
title: Orgia ou O Homem Que Deu Cria
